projects.title: Project 1: CompanyApp
projects.description: It is a console application for some company that I have finished in C#.

projects.title: Project 2: MollaFront
projects.description: It is my first full front-end project. I have written evertything in detail, even wishlist and shop logic with the help of localstorage.

projects.description: It is my first backend project. It is written in MVC. And I have used ASP.NET, as a language C#.
